title: Search Criteria
description:
All hex searches work with and without 0x prefix. The following formats are supported:

  1. Messages 64 Hex characters
  2. Message using Transaction Id 64 Hex characters
  3. Addresses 64 Hex characters or Bech32 Format
  4. Outputs 68 Hex characters
  5. Milestone Index Numeric
  6. Indexes Maximum 64 UTF-8 chars or maximum 128 hex chars
  7. DID 64 Hex characters starting with did:iota:
